title: Enhancing Educational Effectiveness Through Learning Analytics and Co-Design for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A course where pre-service and in-service teachers implement real mathematics lesson scenarios in VR environments and measure educational effectiveness using learning analytics tools.

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to identify individual learning gaps in mathematics classes by 30% or more using learning analytics data
Develop and conduct simulation testing on three or more mathematics education scenarios by applying a co-design approach
Iteratively improve mathematics lesson design twice or more based on learning analytics results, achieving a 15% enhancement in educational effectiveness
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
